summary: 将首页替换为极简精品咖啡店风格：品牌介绍、当季豆单、简版菜单与到店信息，并保持响应式与浅/深色主题。

validation.command: python -c "from lxml import html; d=html.parse('index.html').getroot(); assert '拾光咖啡' in d.xpath('string(//title)'); assert d.xpath(\"//meta[@name='description']/@content\")[0].strip(); assert d.xpath(\"//main[@id='main']\"); nav=set(d.xpath('//nav//a/@href')); assert {'#beans','#menu','#visit'}.issubset(nav); assert all(d.xpath(f\"//*[@id='{i}']\") for i in ['beans','menu','visit']); assert len(d.xpath('//h1'))==1 and '精品咖啡' in d.xpath('string(//h1)'); assert len(d.xpath('//table/tbody/tr'))>=6; print('OK')"

notes: 到店地址/电话/邮箱为示例占位；如用于真实站点请替换为实际信息。
